section.title: 虚拟机管理
section.screen: $ podman machine init # 初始化 $ podman machine start # 启动 podman VM $ podman machine stop # 停止VM $ podman machine list # 罗列VM $ podman machine rm # 删除VM $ podman machine ssh # 通过SSH 进入VM，在终端进行操作

section.title: 切换国内镜像源
section.screen:
cat >> /etc/containers/registries.conf <<EOF
unqualified-search-registries = ["docker.io"]
[[registry]] prefix = "docker.io" location = "hub-mirror.c.163.com" insecure = true
[[registry.mirror]] # 百度镜像源 location = "mirror.baidubce.com" insecure = true [[registry.mirror]] # 网易 163 镜像源 location = "hub-mirror.c.163.com" insecure = true [[registry.mirror]] # 上海交大镜像源 location = "docker.mirrors.sjtug.sjtu.edu.cn" insecure = true [[registry.mirror]] # 南京大学镜像源 location = "docker.nju.edu.cn" insecure = true EOF

[root@netkiller ~]# podman info | grep Location: Location: hub-mirror.c.163.com Location: hub.uuuadc.top Location: docker.anyhub.us.kg Location: dockerhub.jobcher.com Location: dockerhub.icu Location: docker.ckyl.me Location: docker.awsl9527.cn
